signUp.subject: Verify your Email account
signUp.body:
Welcome to Student Service Request System - DAIICT!

Please click on the below mentioned link to verify your email.
Click here to verify

forgetPassword.subject: Password Reset Link
forgetPassword.body:
Hello {{daiictId}},
Please click on the link below to reset your password.
Click here to reset password

passwordChanged.subject: Password successfully changed
passwordChanged.body:
Hello,

This is a confirmation mail for successful change in password for your account - {{daiictId}}

orderCancel-PaymentDelay.templateName: Order cancel due to payment delay
orderCancel-PaymentDelay.subject: Order has been cancelled
orderCancel-PaymentDelay.body: Your order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has been cancelled due to delay in payment.

pendingPaymentOffline.subject: Reminder - Payment Pending
pendingPaymentOffline.body:
Your order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has a pending payment. Please pay fast in {{cancelledInDays}} days to avoid auto cancellation.
Payment code is {{paymentCode}}

pendingPaymentOnline.subject: Reminder - Payment Pending
pendingPaymentOnline.body:
Your order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has a failed payment. Please pay fast in {{cancelledInDays}} days to avoid auto cancellation.
Payment code is {{paymentCode}}.

orderPlaced.subject: Order placed
orderPlaced.body:
Your order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has been placed. Please pay â‚¹ {{totalCost}} to process order.
Payment code is {{paymentCode}}.

failedEasyPayPayment.subject: Payment failed
failedEasyPayPayment.body: Your EasyPay payment for order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has failed. Please try again.

successfulEasyPayPayment.subject: Payment successful
successfulEasyPayPayment.body: Your EasyPay payment for order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has been successful. Your order is in process now. Transaction Id for payment is {{paymentId}}.

offlinePaymentAccepted.subject: Payment successful
offlinePaymentAccepted.body: Your payment of order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has been successful. Your order is in process now.

orderCompleted-Delivery.subject: Order Completed
orderCompleted-Delivery.body: Your order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has been dispatched through {{courierServiceName}}. Tracking Id for delivery is {{trackingId}}.

orderCompleted-Pickup.subject: Order Completed
orderCompleted-Pickup.body: Your order {{orderId}} with {{cartLength}} order(s) has been picked up successfully.

cancelCart.subject: Order cancelled
cancelCart.body:
Your order {{orderId}} has been cancelled.
Reason for cancellation: {{cancelReason}}.
